summary: Professional website for Proxima Academy coaching institute with modern responsive design, blue and gold branding theme, multi-page structure (Home, About, Courses, Why Choose Us, Contact), and integrated features including WhatsApp, testimonials, FAQ, and SEO optimization
architectural_notes: Blue and gold premium branding theme throughout
Responsive design for mobile, tablet, and desktop
Consistent header with PROXIMA ACADEMY branding and 'Learn. Lead. Rise.' tagline on every page
CTA-focused design with 'Book Free Counseling Session' as primary action
Google Maps API integration for location display
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Premium gold and blue gradient background for hero section with subtle academic motifs (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Modern icon set representing concept-based learning, personal attention, IT lab, video lectures, experienced faculty, and exam preparation in blue and gold theme (icons-feature-set.dim_800x600.png)
- Professional academy building or classroom illustration in blue and gold color scheme for About page (academy-illustration.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Update the Navigation component to display 'PROXIMA ACADEMY' in bold, premium typography with the tagline 'Learn. Lead. Rise.' appearing elegant and slightly smaller directly below it on every page
Update HomePage hero section with headline 'Admissions Open 2026–27', prominent Early Bird 50% OFF banner, and clear CTA button 'Book Free Counseling Session'
Update AboutPage to include academy journey narrative, clearly defined mission and vision statements, and detailed teaching philosophy aligned with Proxima Academy values
Update CoursesPage to clearly separate and detail three course categories: 8th–10th Foundation, 11th & 12th Science, and 11th & 12th Commerce with subject coverage for each
Update WhyChooseUsPage to highlight concept clarity, small batch size, personal mentorship, and result-oriented teaching as key differentiators
Implement ContactPage with functional inquiry form collecting student name, contact details, course interest, embedded Google Map showing Bhayandar East location, and WhatsApp contact button
Implement floating WhatsApp button that remains visible and accessible on all pages across the website
Update TestimonialsSection with authentic student and parent testimonials that build trust and showcase results
Update FAQSection to address common parent and student questions about admissions, batch size, board preparation, early bird discount, and enrollment process
Optimize website metadata and content for SEO targeting keywords: 'Best coaching classes in Bhayandar East', '11th 12th commerce classes Bhayandar', 'Science coaching near me'
Update all academy information to reflect focus areas: Concept-based teaching, Exam-oriented preparation, Personal attention, Dedicated IT Lab, Video & Audio Lectures, Experienced Faculty
Ensure all pages maintain professional, trustworthy, premium, student-focused, result-driven tone throughout copy and design

new_feature_requests.summary: Home page with hero section, Early Bird 50% OFF banner, and course overview
About Us page with academy journey, mission, vision, and teaching philosophy
Courses page detailing 8th-10th Foundation, 11th-12th Science, and 11th-12th Commerce
Why Choose Us page highlighting concept clarity, batch size, mentorship, and results
Contact page with inquiry form, Google Map integration, and WhatsApp button
Floating WhatsApp button across all pages
SEO optimization for coaching classes in Bhayandar East area
